description: Conversion of a garage into a habitable room including associated external alteration involving the insertion of windows in lieu of the garage door opening and door to the side, and internal alterations.
decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its insufficient size and space (bedroom, living room, dining room and kitchen area and lack of access to private amenity space would result in a cramped and substandard form of accommodation that would fail to provide acceptable living conditions for future occupiers. The development is therefore contrary to the Nationally Described Space Standards and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)., policy D6 of the London Plan (2021), Housing SPG 2016, Ealing's development (Core) Strategy 2026 and Ealing local variation to London Plan policy 3.5 of the Ealing's Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
